quat2euler.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import rospy
00004 import tf.transformations
00005 from math import pi
00006 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
00007 from geometry_msgs.msg import Vector3
00008 
00009 
00010 def translate_callback(Odo):
00011         pub = rospy.Publisher('sim/euler', Vector3)
00012         (yaw, pitch, roll) = tf.transformations.euler_from_quaternion([Odo.pose.pose.orientation.x, Odo.pose.pose.orientation.y, Odo.pose.pose.orientation.z, Odo.pose.pose.orientation.w],'rzyx')
00013         euler = Vector3()
00014         euler.x = roll*180/pi
00015         euler.y = pitch*180/pi
00016         euler.z = yaw*180/pi
00017         pub.publish(euler)
00018 
00019 if __name__ == '__main__':
00020         try:
00021                 rospy.init_node('quat2euler')
00022                 rospy.Subscriber('sim/states', Odometry, translate_callback)
00023                 while not rospy.is_shutdown():
00024                         rospy.spin()
00025                         
00026         except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
00027                 pass
